name: Simon's Day
description:
Made in  37 total dev hours for The Pacifist Jam (Honest Game Jam IV)! Sucks to have a flu at the latter half and had to cut down story content, but the arcade style worked out perfectly well too!

Controls: Your whole keyboard! Esc to pause the game

Type Simon's thoughts to engage in a conversation with the various people in his school! He needs to get to class but everyone keeps talking to him?? Help him get past everyone!

Watch out for:

FlynnLaura

Flynn likes fast-paced conversations, therefore you have to think fast when you're with him! 

Laura on the other hand, gets really nervous sometimes so you have to remember and think carefully on what you have to say!

Fonts used: Daydream and DePixel

Sprites done in Aseprite

Made in Godot 3.4.2
